title: Promoting the Export of the American AI Technology Stack
summary: The document is an executive order titled "Promoting the Export of the American AI Technology Stack," issued on July 23, 2025. It aims to establish a coordinated national effort to support the American AI industry by promoting the export of full-stack American AI technology packages. The order establishes the American AI Exports Program, which will be managed by the Secretary of Commerce in consultation with other key officials. The program will support the development and deployment of United States full-stack AI export packages, with a focus on specific target countries or regional blocs. The order also mobilizes federal financing tools to support priority AI export packages and aligns technical, financial, and diplomatic resources to accelerate their deployment.
